title: AI and Machine Learning (2025 Spring, Hanyang University)
text:
Course name: BIG3003 (11295/12984), AI and machine learning
Instructor: Seoncheol Park
TA: Min Ju Kim
Language: Korean
Schedule: TUE 09:00-12:00 (Room 222, Building 507)
Textbook:

An Introduction to Statistical Learning, with Applications in Python,
기초부터 다지는 통계학 교과서 with 파이썬

Grading:

Class attendance (10%)
중간고사 (35%)
독후감 (20%)
기말고사 (35%)
